summary: Provides a set of generic factory classes that manage registration, metadata extraction, configuration handling, and code generation for executors, pipelines, data models, and samplers within the DGLGO framework, enabling dynamic construction and optional wrapping of these components.
business_intent: To streamline the creation and customization of inference pipelines and related components by offering a centralized, extensible registration system and utilities for configuring, wrapping, and generating execution scripts for models, samplers, and pipelines.
